text:
Gary Ray Bowles (January 25, 1962 – August 22, 2019) was an American serial killer. He was sentenced to death for the murder of six men in 1994. He was born in Clifton Forge, Virginia. He was convicted of sexual assault, armed robbery and murder.
Bowles was executed by lethal injection on August 22, 2019 at Florida State Prison in Bradford County, aged 57.
